markdown:
| icon           = poe2 waels wind icon.png
| description    = A mixture of rums (and any other strong spirit available) and tropical juices, Wael's Wind is a perennially popular drink during the brutally hot summer months in the Deadfire. Invented by the pirates of the Príncipi sen Patrena, the beverage is traditionally served in the halved shell of a coconut.

Wael's Wind earned its name from its legendary capacity for knocking imbibers flat on their backs and robbing them of their memories of the night before.

* [The Brass Citadel](/theBrassCitadel/): Sold by the [Lounge server](/loungeServer/) in the [Officer's Lounge](/officersLounge/).
* [Dunnage](/dunnage/), [Radiant Court](/radiantCourt/): Sold by [Rosanella](/rosanella/).
* [Crookspur](/crookspur/): In a crate in the northern part of the fortress exterior.
}}
